entities.name: grimmauld place
entities.description: Grimmauld Place is described as a location where magic is present, and it has a mysterious numbering system. The inhabitants of number twelve are never seen by anyone in the surrounding houses.

entities.name: august
entities.description: August is mentioned as the time when the square of unkempt grass in Grimmauld Place was attracting visitors. It is not clear how August is related to the events in Grimmauld Place.

entities.name: grimmauld place inhabitants
entities.description: The inhabitants of number twelve are never seen by anyone in the surrounding houses. They seem to be hiding or avoiding detection.

relationships.description: Grimmauld Place is attracting visitors in August, and the square of unkempt grass is described as being shriveled in the sun until it was brittle and brown.
The inhabitants of number twelve reside in Grimmauld Place, but they are never seen by anyone in the surrounding houses.
